entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low zero. POP 70%
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening. 70 percent chance of flurries overnight. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southwest 20 this evening then light after midnight. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 12 in the afternoon. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 70 percent chance of flurries and risk of freezing drizzle. Wind becoming north 20 km/h early in the afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 12 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 18 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 23. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 18 in the evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 13 February 2023
